column4: Is it a bad idea to set pulse to -20 nice? I get skipping in recordings...
on first though yes, since sound is time critical
Hmm...? It's like missing audio data in the recording... driving me nuts, not to mention pulseaudio just crashed as I was running a game in Blender and exited...
I probably shouldn't even talk about pulseaudio, it makes the veins in my head pulse
